channel.title: Stillgfx timing...(kinda like animation, spells use this kind of animation)
channel.description: if you are smart enough to know what stillgfx stuff is... i need help. I cant figure out how to make, for example, claws of guthix animation appear every 5 seconds. I can make it appear, but it appears once every second (very rapidly). Anyone know what i mean and how do fix it?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 08:11:50 PM[/size][hr]no one gots the brains to answer?? :(

item.title: Stillgfx timing...(kinda like animation, spells use this kind of animation)
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

You would first declare an int such as

public int guthixClaw = 0;

then you would add this to your boolean process

if(guthixClaw > 1) { guthixClaw -= 1; }
Finally you would put this in your boolean process

if(guthixClaw == 5) { stillgfx(put that gfx stuff here) guthixClaw = 0; }
It should be something like that.Might not be correct as im new to integers.

Read full topic
